languages.text: "Кошмар, стоило Лорд-капитану благословить котел, как набежали всякие проходимцы! Так ведь и всю похлебку слопают, и что тогда?"
"Gah, as soon as the Lord Captain blessed the vat, all sorts of riffraff started pushing in and eating up all the soup! What about the rest of us?"
languages.original_text: "Кошмар, стоило Лорд-капитану благословить котел, как набежали всякие проходимцы! Так ведь и всю похлебку слопают, и что тогда?"

traits.locale_text: "Gah, as soon as the Lord Captain blessed the vat, all sorts of riffraff started pushing in and eating up all the soup! What about the rest of us?"
"Gah, as soon as the Lord Captain blessed the vat, all sorts of riffraff started pushing in and eating up all the soup! What about the rest of us?"
"Gah, as soon as the Lord Captain blessed the vat, all sorts of riffraff started pushing in and eating up all the soup! What about the rest of us?"
"Gah, as soon as the Lord Captain blessed the vat, all sorts of riffraff started pushing in and eating up all the soup! What about the rest of us?"
"Gah, as soon as the Lord Captain blessed the vat, all sorts of riffraff started pushing in and eating up all the soup! What about the rest of us?"

languages.text: «¡Bah! ¡En cuanto {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán bendijo la cuba, toda clase de gentuza empezó a colarse y a comerse la sopa! ¿Y qué pasa con el resto de nosotros?».
languages.original_text: "Gah, as soon as the Lord Captain blessed the vat, all sorts of riffraff started pushing in and eating up all the soup! What about the rest of us?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Bah! ¡En cuanto {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán bendijo la cuba, toda clase de gentuza empezó a colarse y a comerse la sopa! ¿Y qué pasa con el resto de nosotros?».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンが桶を祝福したとたん、いろんな連中が押し寄せてきて、スープを食い尽くしてしまった！食べられなかった者達はどうすればいいんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Gah, as soon as the Lord Captain blessed the vat, all sorts of riffraff started pushing in and eating up all the soup! What about the rest of us?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンが桶を祝福したとたん、いろんな連中が押し寄せてきて、スープを食い尽くしてしまった！食べられなかった者達はどうすればいいんだ？」

languages.text: “啧，舰长大人才刚刚祝福过这口大缸，各种各样的人就开始往这边挤，把所有汤都喝光了！我们剩下的人该怎么办？”
languages.original_text: "Gah, as soon as the Lord Captain blessed the vat, all sorts of riffraff started pushing in and eating up all the soup! What about the rest of us?"

traits.locale_text: “啧，舰长大人才刚刚祝福过这口大缸，各种各样的人就开始往这边挤，把所有汤都喝光了！我们剩下的人该怎么办？”

languages.text: "Ach, sobald der Lord Captain das Fass gesegnet hatte, hat sich alles mögliche Gesindel vorgedrängt und die ganze Suppe aufgegessen! Was ist mit dem Rest von uns?"
languages.original_text: "Gah, as soon as the Lord Captain blessed the vat, all sorts of riffraff started pushing in and eating up all the soup! What about the rest of us?"

traits.locale_text: "Ach, sobald der Lord Captain das Fass gesegnet hatte, hat sich alles mögliche Gesindel vorgedrängt und die ganze Suppe aufgegessen! Was ist mit dem Rest von uns?"

languages.text: « Bah, à peine Sa Seigneurie avait-elle béni la cuve que toutes sortes de canailles ont joué des coudes et mangé toute la soupe ! Et nous, alors ? »
languages.original_text: "Gah, as soon as the Lord Captain blessed the vat, all sorts of riffraff started pushing in and eating up all the soup! What about the rest of us?"

traits.locale_text: « Bah, à peine Sa Seigneurie avait-elle béni la cuve que toutes sortes de canailles ont joué des coudes et mangé toute la soupe ! Et nous, alors ? »
